products.name: Classic Lemonade
products.description: Our signature classic lemonade made with fresh lemons and cane sugar

products.name: Sugar-Free Lemonade
products.description: All the flavor with zero sugar, sweetened with stevia

products.name: Strawberry Bliss
products.description: Fresh strawberry puree blended with our classic lemonade

products.name: Ginger Zing
products.description: A refreshing kick of fresh ginger in our classic lemonade

products.name: Lavender Dream
products.description: Floral lavender infused lemonade for a unique experience

products.name: Party Pack (6 bottles)
products.description: Mix and match any 6 lemonades of your choice

faqs.question: What are your lemonade flavors?
faqs.answer: We offer Classic, Sugar-Free, Strawberry Bliss, Ginger Zing, and Lavender Dream!

faqs.question: Are your lemonades vegan?
faqs.answer: Yes! All our lemonades are 100% vegan and plant-based.

faqs.question: How long does shipping take?
faqs.answer: We ship within 2-3 business days. Standard shipping takes 3-5 days.

faqs.question: What is your return policy?
faqs.answer: If you're not satisfied, contact us within 7 days for a full refund!
